languages.text: {n}Великан изрыгает страшный, замогильный рев... который переходит в не менее дикий хохот. Отсмеявшись до слез из глаз, рыжеволосый без всякой угрозы бросает вам:{/n} "Ладно, ты меня раззадорил{mf||а}. И, судя по запаху, не обмарал{mf||а} штаны в процессе. Смелых я уважаю, с тобой можно иметь дело".

{n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Великан изрыгает страшный, замогильный рев... который переходит в не менее дикий хохот. Отсмеявшись до слез из глаз, рыжеволосый без всякой угрозы бросает вам:{/n} "Ладно, ты меня раззадорил{mf||а}. И, судя по запаху, не обмарал{mf||а} штаны в процессе. Смелых я уважаю, с тобой можно иметь дело".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a white-knuckled grip on the bars, the prisoner lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, the giant stops stop chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}眼前的巨人发出了令人窒息的恐怖吼声……随后又变成了同样狂野的大笑声。他抹掉了笑出来的眼泪，停了下来，再次开了口。这次，他的声音中已经一丝威胁的意味都没有了。{/n}“好了，你确实把我惹火了。而且从味道判断，你并没有吓得拉一裤子屎。我尊重那些有胆量的人，我可以和你并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个囚犯死死地抓着铁栏杆，握得指节都发白了，发出了令人窒息的恐怖吼声……随后又变成了同样狂野的大笑声。你眼前的巨人抹掉了笑出来的眼泪，停了下来，再次开了口。这次，他的声音中已经一丝威胁的意味都没有了。{/n}“好了，你确实把我惹火了。而且从味道判断，你并没有吓得拉一裤子屎。我尊重那些有胆量的人，我可以和你并肩作战。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}巨人はおぞましく、獰猛な唸り声を上げる。涙を拭い、笑うのをやめて、脅す響きのまったくない声でこう言った。{/n}「わかった。俺をここまで怒らせる奴は滅多にいない。臭いでわかるが、今のでびびって漏らした様子もない。俺は勇気のある奴は好きだ。あんたに手を貸そう」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人はおぞましく、獰猛な唸り声を上げる。涙を拭い、笑うのをやめて、脅す響きのまったくない声でこう言った。{/n}「わかった。俺をここまで怒らせる奴は滅多にいない。臭いでわかるが、今のでびびって漏らした様子もない。俺は勇気のある奴は好きだ。あんたに手を貸そう」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El gigante suelta un rugido aterrador y sepulcral... que da paso a una risotada igualmente salvaje. Se seca las lágrimas, deja de reírse y, sin amenaza alguna, comenta:{/n} «Bueno, ha logrado buscarme las cosquillas. Y, por lo que huelo, lo ha hecho sin cagarse durante el proceso. Puedo respetar ese valor. Así que puedo trabajar con usted».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Agarrando los barrotes con tanta fuerza que los nudillos se ponen blancos, el prisionero suelta un rugido aterrador y sepulcral... que da paso a una risotada igualmente salvaje. Se seca las lágrimas, deja de reírse y, sin amenaza alguna, comenta:{/n} «Bueno, ha logrado buscarme las cosquillas. Y, por lo que huelo, lo ha hecho sin cagarse durante el proceso. Puedo respetar ese valor. Así que puedo trabajar con usted».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le géant pousse un hurlement effrayant, presque sépulcral... avant d'éclater d'un rire tout aussi sauvage. Il se calme d'un coup, essuie les larmes qui lui coulent sur le visage et, sans la moindre trace de menace dans sa voix, remarque :{/n} « Bon, vous avez réussi à m'énerver. Et d'après ce que je peux sentir, vous ne vous êtes pas {mf|souillé|souillée}. Je respecte le courage. Je peux travailler avec vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout en s'agrippant aux barreaux, le prisonnier pousse un hurlement effrayant, presque sépulcral... avant d'éclater d'un rire tout aussi sauvage. Il se calme d'un coup, essuie les larmes qui lui coulent sur le visage et, sans la moindre trace de menace dans sa voix, remarque :{/n} « Bon, vous avez réussi à m'énerver. Et d'après ce que je peux sentir, vous ne vous êtes pas {mf|souillé|souillée}. Je respecte le courage. Je peux travailler avec vous. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der Riese stößt ein Furcht erregendes Brüllen aus ... das sich in ein ebenso unangenehmes Lachen verwandelt. Er wischt sich die Tränen ab, hört auf zu lachen und merkt ohne jede Bedrohlichkeit in der Stimme an:{/n} "Gut, Ihr habt mich provoziert. Und soweit ich das riechen kann, habt Ihr dabei nicht eingenässt. Ich respektiere Mut. Mit Euch kann ich arbeiten."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Handknöchel sind schon weiß durch den Griff um das Gitter, da lässt der Gefangene ein entsetzlich düsteres Gebrüll erschallen ... das sich in ein ebenso unangenehmes Lachen verwandelt. Der Riese wischt sich die Tränen ab, hört auf zu kichern und merkt ohne jede Bedrohlichkeit in der Stimme an:{/n} "Gut, Ihr habt mich provoziert. Und soweit ich das riechen kann, habt Ihr dabei nicht eingenässt. Ich respektiere Mut. Mit Euch kann ich arbeiten."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}With a white-knuckled grip on the bars, the prisoner lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, the giant stops stop chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

languages.text: {n}Dev, tüylerini diken diken eden bir kasvetle kükrüyor. Kükremesi, aynı derecede yabani bir kahkahaya dönüşüyor. Göz yaşlarını silerken kıkırdamasına son veriyor. Ardından en ufak bir tehditkârlık barındırmayan bir tonla konuşuyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ, sonunda tepemi attırdın. Ortamdaki kokulara bakarsak altına yapmamayı da başarmışsın. Cesaretlilere saygı duyarım. El birliği edebiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant lets out a frightening, sepulchral roar... which turns into equally savage laughter. Wiping away tears, he stops chuckling, and without a hint of threat in his voice, remarks,{/n} "Fine, you got a rise out of me. And from what I can smell, you did not soil yourself in the process. I respect those with courage. I can work with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dev, tüylerini diken diken eden bir kasvetle kükrüyor. Kükremesi, aynı derecede yabani bir kahkahaya dönüşüyor. Göz yaşlarını silerken kıkırdamasına son veriyor. Ardından en ufak bir tehditkârlık barındırmayan bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ, sonunda tepemi attırdın. Ortamdaki kokulara bakarsak altına yapmamayı da başarmışsın. Cesaretlilere saygı duyarım. Seninle çalışabilirim."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
